getViewCoordinatePoint

public void getViewCoordinatePoint(double latitude,
                                   double longitude,
                                   android.graphics.Point point)
This method is not implemented yet. Calculate the view coordinate point of the given latitude longitude.

Parameters:
latitude - Latitude of the point of interest
longitude - Longitude of the point of interest
point - Point to be assigned with the view coordinate point of the given geo-coordinate

Calculate the view coordinate point of the given scene

Parameters:
scene - The scene of interest
point - Point to be assigned with the view coordinate point of the given scene
